Name: Che's Revolution
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Garnish with pineapple wedge on rim.
Review: Complex and easy drinking with hints of maple syrup and mint amongst the pineapple and rum.
History: Created in 2003 by Ben Reed for the launch party of MJU Bar @ Millennium Hotel in London, England
